messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] What??
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/6/03 5:03:50 AM, CelticFrau@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/6/03 5:03:50 AM, CelticFrau@... writes:

<< I don't have 238 emails to read this morning??? You slackers! >>

Well, you could deny having said this, or say if we thought you said you were
surprised there wasn't more mail that we just can't bother to read your whole
post, that might generate some mail. I could say "Why are you calling me a
slacker? Why are you being personal?" Then you could say Sandra ALWAYS
does that and everyone knows it and I could say an unschooler wouldn't have
said that to me and then you can say "I was on this list before and people
seemed not to understand me and here I am again and they still don't
understand me so obviously this list is never going to change."

Then five people would defend one of us and three would defend the other, but
ten people would say we should all just hush because they joined this list
for peace and quiet, not to read discussions.

Sandra
